remarks: A Hilbert lattice has the exchange property.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2011.)
statement:
hlsuprexch.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlexchb1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ -. P .<_ X ) -> ( P .<_ ( X .\/ Q ) <-> ( X .\/ P ) = ( X .\/ Q ) ) ) $.
